titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

msIdentifier.repository: Princeton University. Library. Dept. of Rare Books and Special Collections

body.ab:
1935 CRANE Louise 58 rue de Vanguard
1m. 1v. ref. Feb 18 dep 50v 15v 22 Oct. Ulysses 18 Nov 8 Nov. " St. Gilbert 0.50 27- 18 27 Nov. Beany Eye 1v Nov 30 30 Nov Odyssey, Homer, Murray's Crane 2 vols 9 Dec. Renewed 22 Nov - 22 December 15v 3 Dec. Ulysses- St Gilbert 0.50 3f pd 18 9 - Hist. of France (Duclaux) 11 - 16 - Dubliners 18 18-Dec. Making of Ulysses Jan 2 Chamber Music 28 26 Dec. In Morocco (Wharton) 0.50 28 Virgin Spain 0.50 28 Renew 28 Spanish Journey 0.50 Jan 2 Renewed 22 Dec - 22 January - 15v Jan 2 Exiles Jan 10 Jan 9 10 Criterion 1v a day Jan 17 Jan 17 Transition vol 1 nos 1-4 Jan 23 Renewed Jan 22 - Feb 22 1936 15v Jan 17 2 New Yorkers at 1v Jan 20 20 1.50 : 29. 23. Introductory Lectures on Psychoanalysis 29 28 Dream Psychology. +.50: pd. 29 Feb 12. Recollections on the dream of a porcupine 18 Death in the afternoon. extra. 25cn 18. New Yorker. Jan. 18. 1.50 18. 6 extras 7 50 pd.
CRANE Miss Louise 18 quai d'Orl√©ans Hotel Foyot. paid 75v for book lost out of dep 25v left 1 month dep 100 25 July 2 Mont Saint Michel + Chateau July 15 July 5 5. Illusion and Reality (1v a day) bought 9 Northern France. July 15 15 Hart Crane. 27 16 Poetry July 1937 17 27 Staying with Relations 27 New Yorker (50c a day) Aug. 6 29 European Experiences. (50c a day) Aug 6 29 Enormous Room (50c a day) Aug 6 29 Princess Casamassima 50c a day Sept 8 29 Left Review May June July (50c a day Aug 6 Aug 2 Criterion 1v a day each) Sept 8 6 Men without Women . . lost see S.B. 6 Shorter Poems. R.B. Sept. 8 6 New Writing Sept 8 6 Meaning of meaning Oct 12 Sept 8 Art of being Ruled paid. Oct 12 (Miss Bishop owes. b2.50 for book The Trial) see SB 50v Renewed Aug. 2 - October 2 _ 2m. 1v. 25v Sept 22 New Yorker 1v a ay paid 8v pc Oct 11 Renewed Oct 2 - Nov 2 1937 2 vols 50 fr Oct 22 2 New Yorkers Oct 2 Sept 25 (no charge) Oct 15 Oct 15 9 Live under a Black Sun Oct 20 15 to Have & Have Not Oct 25 15 Left Review Oct no 1v a day bought Oct 25
CRANE Oct 20 Some Versions of Pastoral Oct 25 Mediaeval Mind vol I 2v a day 10v Oct 25 Maggie 2v a day 10v Oct 25 Oct 25 Letters from Iceland Nov 2 New Yorker 2v Nov 2 Red Badge of Courage Nov 5 Nov 2 Criterion April & Oct 1937 2v Nov 5 Men Women & Boats Nov 5 Nov 5
Nov 10 Sally Bowles sold 29.75 Piers Plowman sold 17.00 House or (unpaid) 46.75 owes didnt return books before leaving so consider them sold if OK with Miss Crane - when she comes back 1938 Jan 7 1938 received cheque from Miss Crane for 75 frs
address: Sugar Hill, Dalton, Mass. U.S.A. paid 75 owed 46,75 credit 28,25
